title: When you get aced and the entire enemy team pops level 7 masteries,
body:
The rager on your team,
http://www.xclusivetouch.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2014/05/fuck-megan-fox-lies-love-gif-friends-angry.gif

Personally I'd be like,
http://www.reactiongifs.us/wp-content/uploads/2013/02/not_even_mad.gif

replies.body: If only there was a " I have 0 mastery but still crushed your lvl 7 mastery emote"  like a small emoji poping up with a smiley face saying " cool story bro"
{{champion:13}}  ,,Now take your Mastery Level 7 and stick it... Somewhere safe..."

You see one of the people on their team has the Lv 7 Mastery on Galio and your like:

http://www.wrestling123.org/wp-content/uploads/2012/01/John-Cena-Salute.jpg
Me when i see a mastery 7 {{champion:6}}
why are you downvoted D;
No one likes Udyr mains. As an Udyr main myself I get a lot of negative flack all the time in game when I use my lvl 7 emote; So i only save it for really good outplays.
How do they know he's an Udyr main? FEK or GD?
It was originally Udyr's icon. He switched it to Urgot after he got the downvotes.

> [{quoted}](name=Embertine,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=mVOEbvJ1,comment-id=000600000002000000000000,timestamp=2016-06-24T13:25:30.672+0000)
>
> It was originally Udyr's icon. He switched it to Urgot after he got the downvotes.

I also originally misunderstood the meme. Changed it after i realized what it was actually meant to say.
oh, le sneaky poo.

"Udyr" "outplay"?

http://memesvault.com/wp-content/uploads/Asian-Meme-Impossibru-09.jpg
/salute back!
{{champion:83}}  - Godspeed you glorious bastard.
I feel {{champion:27}} would be harder to get lvl 7
Singed is amazing and super easy to get S on, what are you even talking about. Also you can pick him into anything not named Gnar/Lulu and he always counters some meta picks.

And again hard cc teams

I have no idea how to play singed and what is his job,  but I try to have fun with him in rgm
Farting and flinging....dats about it.
AND HIS NAME IS JOHN CENA

I'm just like 

https://storage.googleapis.com/vidsums/c2b9c493-861c-4480-9aba-cfbc9632655e_text.gif
Damn, their loading screen must be glorious.
Ikr?  Seeing two of my friends get mastery 7 and me with mastery 6 fills me with envy.
If the rager on my team looked like that I'd be a lot more tolerant.
When you ace them and they all put up their mastery 7 icons.

I'm that person that just spams mastery while they're dead. 

I just want some love.
Certainly better than when you're 20 CS (and a kill) up on your lane opponent but the score is 2 - 10 in their favor ... and he pops his lv 7 mastery.
I'm a simple man. I see a spacebound video meme and I upvote.
Same man, I think best Iv'e ever seen was a full team of lvl5 and up (not all the same){{champion:432}}
I always forget to flash it but remember when it's too late :(.
Because having lvl 7 means you're "skillful"...on Supports it's pure luck if you get S, especially utility Supports.

Lol,  I'm filler main, unfortunately,  in this season I played way too many games as support and I already have chests for all my mages supports. 

No,  I don't care about rank 6 or 7, I got the tokens,  but only to get a dumb icon... That's not worth for me
But then my team is able to turn the game and I'm like: nice mastery bro,  I wish it could help you win
